verses.kjv: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.
verses.ct: Now about the financial contribution for God's people: follow the same instructions I gave to the churches in Galatia.

verses.kjv: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.
verses.ct: Every Sunday, each of you should set aside some money in proportion to how God has blessed you financially, so that no collections need to be taken when I arrive.

verses.kjv: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
verses.ct: When I get there, I will send the people you approve — with letters of introduction — to carry your generous gift to Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.
verses.ct: If it seems worthwhile for me to go as well, they can travel with me.

verses.kjv: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.
verses.ct: I plan to visit you after I travel through Macedonia, since I will be passing through that region.

verses.kjv: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.
verses.ct: I may end up staying with you for a while, possibly even through the winter, so that you can help me on my way to wherever I go next.

verses.kjv: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
verses.ct: I don't want to see you just briefly in passing. Instead, I'm hoping to spend an extended time with you, if the Lord allows it.

verses.kjv: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
verses.ct: But I will stay in Ephesus until Pentecost,

verses.kjv: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
verses.ct: because a tremendous and productive opportunity has opened up for me here, even though there are many opponents.

verses.kjv: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.
verses.ct: If Timothy comes to you, make sure he has nothing to worry about while he's there, because he is doing the Lord's work just as I am.

verses.kjv: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.
verses.ct: So no one should look down on him. Send him off with your blessing and in peace so he can return to me, because I'm expecting him along with the brothers.

verses.kjv: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
verses.ct: As for our brother Apollos, I strongly encouraged him to visit you with the other brothers, but he was definitely not willing to come right now. He will come when he finds the right opportunity.

verses.kjv: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
verses.ct: Stay alert, hold firm in the faith, be courageous, and be strong.

verses.kjv: Let all your things be done with charity.
verses.ct: Do everything you do with love.

verses.kjv: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, I urge you — you know that the household of Stephanas were the first converts in Achaia, and that they have devoted themselves to serving God's people —

verses.kjv: That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with us, and laboureth.
verses.ct: place yourselves under the leadership of people like them, and under everyone who joins in the work and labors alongside us.

verses.kjv: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.
verses.ct: I'm glad that Stephanas, Fortunatus, and Achaicus came to me, because they made up for what was missing without you here.

verses.kjv: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.
verses.ct: They lifted my spirit and yours as well. Give proper recognition to people like them.

verses.kjv: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.
verses.ct: The churches in the province of Asia send their greetings. Aquila and Priscilla send you warm greetings in the Lord, along with the church that meets in their home.

verses.kjv: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.
verses.ct: All the brothers and sisters here send their greetings. Welcome one another with a holy kiss.

verses.kjv: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
verses.ct: I, Paul, am writing this greeting with my own hand.

verses.kjv: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.
verses.ct: If anyone does not love the Lord Jesus Christ, let that person be cursed. Come, Lord!

verses.kjv: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
verses.ct: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

verses.kjv: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.
verses.ct: My love is with all of you in Christ Jesus. Amen.
